import React from 'react' import CheckoutSteps from '../componenets/CheckoutSteps'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if(!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push('/payment'); } return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalcode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items:

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty}*${item.price}= {item.qty * item.price}
      • ))}
) }
